attributes.action: Stop unlawful killings carried out by American police & prosecute those that do
attributes.background: While the whole world watches on American police are killing the very people they are suppose to serve and protect especially Black Americans THIS NEEDS TO STOP! We the people of the world must take action. More than 550 lives lost by police in America in 2016 alone!!!! How much more?

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament are not responsible for policing in America.
